lines.line: Welcome to the church of holy Saradomin.
I'm looking for a quest.
That's lucky, I need someone to do a quest for me.
Okay, let me help then.
Thank you. The problem is, there is a ghost in the church graveyard. I would like you to get rid of it.
If you need any help, my friend Father Urhney is an expert on ghosts.
I believe he is currently living as a hermit in Lumbridge swamp. He has a little shack in the far west of the swamps.
Exit the graveyard through the south gate to reach the swamp. I'm sure if you told him that I sent you he'd be willing to help.
My name is Father Aereck by the way. Pleased to meet you.
Likewise.
Take care travelling through the swamps, I have heard they can be quite dangerous.
I will, thanks.
Sorry, I don't have time right now.
Oh well. If you do have some spare time on your hands, come back and talk to me.
Have you got rid of the ghost yet?
I can't find Father Urhney at the moment.
Well, you can get to the swamp he lives in by going south through the cemetery.
You'll have to go right into the far western depths of the swamp, near the coastline. That is where his house is.
Go away! I'm meditating!
Well, that's friendly.
I SAID go AWAY.
Okay, okay... sheesh, what a grouch.
Father Aereck sent me to talk to you.
I suppose I'd better talk to you then. What problems has he got himself into this time?
He's got a ghost haunting his graveyard.
Oh, the silly fool.
I leave town for just five months, and ALREADY he can't manage.
Well, I can't go back and exorcise it. I vowed not to leave this place. Until I had done a full two years of prayer and meditation.
Tell you what I can do though; take this amulet.
It is an Amulet of Ghostspeak.
So called, because when you wear it you can speak to ghosts. A lot of ghosts are doomed to be ghosts because they have left some important task uncompleted.
Maybe if you know what this task is, you can get rid of the ghost. I'm not making any guarantees mind you, but it is the best I can do right now.
Thank you. I'll give it a try!
You mean he gets himself into lots of problems?
Yeah. For example, when we were trainee priests he kept on getting stuck up bell ropes.
Anyway. I don't have time for chitchat. What's his problem THIS time?
I've come to repossess your house.
Under what grounds???
Repeated failure on mortgage repayments.
What?
But... I don't have a mortgage! I built this house myself!
Sorry. I must have got the wrong address. All the houses look the same around here.
What? What houses? What ARE you talking about???
Never mind.
I don't know. I just wanted this house...
Oh... go away and stop wasting my time!
I had a talk with Father Urhney. He has given me this funny amulet to talk to the ghost with.
I always wondered what that amulet was... Well, I hope it's useful. Tell me when you get rid of the ghost!
I've lost the Amulet of Ghostspeak.
What are you talking about? I can see you've got it with you!
You come here wasting my time... Has it even occurred to you that you've got it stored somewhere? Now GO AWAY!
How careless can you get? Those things aren't easy to come by you know! Now clear some space in your inventory and I'll give you another one.
How careless can you get? Those things aren't easy to come by you know! It's a good job I've got a spare.
Be more careful this time.
Okay, I'll try to be.
Hello ghost, how are you?
Wooo wooo wooooo!
Sorry, I don't speak ghost.
Woo woo?
Nope, still don't understand you.
WOOOOOOOOO!
Ooh, THAT'S interesting.
Woo wooo. Woooooooooooooooooo!
Did he really?
Woo.
My brother had EXACTLY the same problem.
Woo Wooooo!
Wooooo Woo woo woo!
You'll have to give me the recipe some time...
Wooooooo woo woooooooo.
Hmm... I'm not so sure about that.
Wooo woo?
Well, if you INSIST.
Wooooooooo!
Ah well, better be off now...
Bye.
Yeah, that's what I thought.
Wooo woooooooooooooo...
Goodbye. Thanks for the chat.
Wooo wooo?
Any hints where I can find some treasure?
Wooooooo woo! Wooooo woo wooooo woowoowoo woo Woo wooo. Wooooo woo woo? Woooooooooooooooooo!
Thank you. You've been very helpful.
Wooooooo.
Not very good actually.
What's the problem then?
Did you just understand what I said???
Yep, now tell me what the problem is.
WOW! This is INCREDIBLE! I didn't expect anyone to ever understand me again!
Ok, Ok, I can understand you!
But have you any idea WHY you're doomed to be a ghost?
Well, to be honest... I'm not sure.
I've been told a certain task may need to be completed so you can rest in peace.
I should think it is probably because a warlock has come along and stolen my skull. If you look inside my coffin there, you'll find my corpse without a head on it.
Do you know where this warlock might be now?
I think it was one of the warlocks who lives in the big tower by the sea south-west from here.
Ok. I will try and get the skull back for you, then you can rest in peace.
Ooh, thank you. That would be such a great relief!
It is so dull being a ghost...
No, you sound like you're speaking nonsense to me.
Oh that's a pity. You got my hopes up there.
Yeah, it is a pity. Sorry about that.
Hang on a second... you CAN understand me!
No I can't.
Great. The first person I can speak to in ages...and they're a moron.
Yep, clever aren't I?
I'm impressed. You must be very powerful. I don't suppose you can stop me being a ghost?
Yes, ok. Do you know WHY you're a ghost?
Nope. I just know I can't do much of anything like this!
No, you're scary!
Great.
The first person I can speak to in ages...
..and they're an idiot.
Wow, this amulet works!
Oh! It's your amulet that's doing it! I did wonder. I don't suppose you can help me? I don't like being a ghost.
How are you doing finding my skull?
Sorry, I can't find it at the moment.
Ah well. Keep on looking.
I'm pretty sure it's somewhere in the tower south-west from here. There's a lot of levels to the tower, though. I suppose it might take a little while to find.
I've found out that the ghost's corpse has lost its skull. If I can find the skull, the ghost should leave.
That WOULD explain it.
Hmmmmm. Well, I haven't seen any skulls.
Yes, I think a warlock has stolen it.
I hate warlocks.
Ah well, good luck!
I've finally found the ghost's skull!
Great! Put it in the ghost's coffin and see what happens!
I have found it!
Hurrah! Now I can stop being a ghost! You just need to put it in my coffin there, then I'll be free!
If you just put it in my coffin that should do the trick...
Release! Thank you stranger..

characters.name: Father Aereck
characters.description: Elderly male, British accent, warm and gentle tone with a hint of world-weariness. A kindly but slightly clumsy priest who runs Lumbridge church and often finds himself in mishaps.

characters.name: Father Urhney
characters.description: Older male, British accent, gruff and irritable tone. A hermit priest who values his solitude and meditation but is frequently interrupted, making him perpetually exasperated yet fundamentally helpful.

characters.name: Restless ghost
characters.description: Male ghost, hollow and ethereal voice with mournful undertones. A spectral being trapped in the mortal realm due to his stolen skull, conveying both supernatural otherness and genuine anguish.
